title: RoiAlignTest.CheckCPUGPUEqual is flaky
body_html:
10:30:20 [ RUN      ] RoiAlignTest.CheckCPUGPUEqual
10:30:20 WARNING: Logging before InitGoogleLogging() is written to STDERR
10:30:20 W0603 10:30:20.651679   477 init.h:99] Caffe2 GlobalInit should be run before any other API calls.
10:30:20 /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/caffe2/operators/roi_align_op_gpu_test.cc:258: Failure
10:30:20 Expected equality of these values:
10:30:20   y_cpu_vec[max_diff_idx]
10:30:20     Which is: 0.93750066
10:30:20   y_gpu_vec[max_diff_idx]
10:30:20     Which is: 0.93750036
10:30:21 [  FAILED  ] RoiAlignTest.CheckCPUGPUEqual (623 ms)

CC @yinghai @xkszltl

If no one has time to investigate we should disable this test.
